subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The “Moneyball” guru Billy Beane has found hard times, but the concept lives on. Shrewd management has helped the Brewers, Cardinals, Rangers and Tigers thrive.
snippet: The “Moneyball” guru Billy Beane has found hard times, but the concept lives on. Shrewd management has helped the Brewers, Cardinals, Rangers and Tigers thrive.
